explanation: I have chosen the 2 litres of 180 proof liquor as the most important remaining item because it can serve multiple purposes in a survival situation. It can be used as an antiseptic for cleaning wounds, as a fire starter, and it can also provide a temporary source of calories and warmth if consumed in small amounts. In a dire situation like being stranded in the desert, having a versatile item like alcohol could significantly improve our chances of survival.
